1.1.1.name: wordpress/wp-bootstrap-navmenu
1.1.1.description: WP Bootstrap Menu convert wordpress nav menu style to Twitter Bootstrap [http://twitter.github.com/bootstrap/] navmenu style. You can join to WP Bootstrap Menu developing [https://github.com/sajjadrad/wp-bootstrap-navmenu] . Compatible with Bootstrap 2.2.2 and support sub menu.
